name: Berkley Fireline Tracer Superline Fishing Line

reviews.name: Berkley Fireline Tracer Superline Fishing Line
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Fireline for over 10 years, but the Fireline Tracer is a great improvement.
reviews.title: Great while fishing in high mountain lakes.

reviews.name: Berkley Fireline Tracer Superline Fishing Line
reviews.reviewText: I started using FireLine several years ago because that is what my favorite fishing guide used on his client tackle (I prefer to use my own). I had just returned from Brazil and the Suffix brand line I used there didn't stand up to the hard usage and constant casting involved in fishing for peacock bass. On a trip with Brad to San Antonio Bay, Texas, for speckled trout and redfish, I was having maddening roll backs and stops using the other line due to little tags of fuzz on the line. I re-spooled with Berkley FireLine from a 1500" spool he had on board and the problems ceased. I have been using FireLine ever since with minimal casting problems. I prefer Tracer color.
reviews.title: I like it.

reviews.name: Berkley Fireline Tracer Superline Fishing Line
reviews.reviewText: New to fishing one of does guys that buys the Best !! Buy Nice or Buy Twice !!! Was what I found the Best out of what I was seeing out there !! Fished on the Beach it was great could see the Tracer 30lb (smoke&green) it's on my 10ft okuma rod & reel! Also put the Tracer 20lb on my 8ft ugly stick with a Penn Reel
reviews.title: Fireline is good to Me

reviews.name: Berkley Fireline Tracer Superline Fishing Line
reviews.reviewText: I recently decided to purchase the new Berkeley Tracer Fused line in 20 lb test. It performed incredibly during two days of fishing in rocks and timber for largemouth and smallmouth. The line held its colors and still looks like new!
reviews.title: Excellent abrasion resistance!
